output: html_document
---

After the aggregation, here we test the outliers

add a world map
```{R}
library(maps)
library(ggplot2)
worlddata <- map_data('world')

```

#### tropical forest

```{R}
library(ggplot2)

rsr_aggregated<-read.csv('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\raw_data\\forest_tropical_raw_aggregated.csv')
print(ggplot()+
  geom_map(data = worlddata, map = worlddata,aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, map_id = region),fill = 'white',color = '#7f7f7f',size = 0.5)+
  geom_point(data = rsr_aggregated, aes(x = longitude, y = latitude,color = ratio))+
  scale_colour_gradientn(colors = rainbow(10, end = 4/6)))
uplevel<-1.2
print(paste0('forest','__',uplevel))
print(ggplot(rsr_aggregated)+
        geom_histogram(aes(ratio),binwidth = 0.1)+
        geom_vline(xintercept = uplevel))
print(ggplot()+
  geom_map(data = worlddata, map = worlddata,aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, map_id = region),fill = 'white',color = '#7f7f7f',size = 0.5)+
  geom_point(data = rsr_aggregated[rsr_aggregated$ratio>=uplevel,], aes(x = longitude, y = latitude,color = ratio))+
  scale_colour_gradientn(colors = rainbow(10, end = 4/6)))
rsr_aggregated_cleaned<-rsr_aggregated[rsr_aggregated$ratio<uplevel,]
write.csv(rsr_aggregated_cleaned, 'C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data\\forest_tropical_cleaned_aggregated_first.csv')

```

Bind all the tables in each biome to tables by vegetation types

```{R}
biomelist<-c('temperate','boreal','med','flood')

typelist<-c('forest','grass','shrub')

```
```{R}
for (tp in typelist){
  rsr_cleaned<-read.csv(paste0('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data\\',tp,'_tropical','_cleaned_aggregated_first.csv'))
  for(st in biomelist){
    cleaned_addon<-read.csv(paste0('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data\\',tp,'_',st, '_cleaned_aggregated_first.csv'))
    rsr_cleaned<-rbind(rsr_cleaned,cleaned_addon)
  }
  write.csv(rsr_cleaned,paste0('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data\\',tp,'_aggregated_cleaned_20191022.csv'))
}


```

Output as shapefile

```{R}
library(rgdal)
for(tp in typelist){
  rsr.for.shp<-read.csv(paste0('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data\\',tp,'_aggregated_cleaned_20191022.csv'))
  index<-c(1:NROW(rsr.for.shp))
  rsr.for.shp$index<-index
  rsr.for.shp$long<-rsr.for.shp$longitude
  rsr.for.shp$lat<-rsr.for.shp$latitude
  print(head(rsr.for.shp))
  coordinates(rsr.for.shp)<-~long+lat
  proj4string(rsr.for.shp)<-CRS('+init=epsg:4326')
writeOGR(rsr.for.shp, 'C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\root_ratio\\cleaned_data',paste0(tp,'_aggregated_cleaned_20191024'),'ESRI Shapefile')
}



```
